revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Three letters on the subject of the Marine Society...being a full detail of the rules and forms...To which is prefixed, a general view of the motives for establish..."
revision.text: Possibly: Three letters on the subject of the Marine Society...being a full detail of the rules and forms...To which is prefixed, a general view of the motives for establishing this Society / By Mr. Hanway. (Jonas Hanway). (London : Sold by R. and J. Dodsley; P. Vaillant; J. Waugh, 1758). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1334237~S1; OR: Two letters. Let. IV. Being thoughts on the means of augmenting the number of Mariners in these kingdoms...Let. V. To Robert Dingley...containing moral and political reasons for relieving prostitutes who are inclined to forsake their evil course of life... / By Mr. Hanway. (London : [s.n.], 1758). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1334238~S1
